K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459a-15: des sbyin pa byin na de'i sbyin pa de yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459a-17: gzhan yang phan btags pa'i lan du phan 'dogs par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin na de yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459a-18: des sman pa dang 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir gang 'di lta bu'i sems kyis me la sbyin pa sbyin no zhe'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459a-19: me lce la sbyin pa sbyin no zhe'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459a-20: chu la sbyin pa sbyin no zhe'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459a-21: des bdag yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyal po la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa de yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459a-22: gang mi 'jigs pa'i phyir chom pa la sogs pa la sbyin pa byin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459a-23: thun mong ma yin pa lnga byin na sbyin pa yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-1: srog chags bsad de sha sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-2: bag med pa rnams la chang sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-5: mchod par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems can bsdu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-6: 'thob pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-9: tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-15: dga' bar bya ba'i phyir rol mo mkhan rnams la sbyin pa sbyin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-16: sbyin pa de yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-17: gang gza'i mtshan ma'i phyir skar mkhan la sbyin pa gtong bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-18: gang gzhan gyi nor mdza' bo la sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-19: gang gi khyim mam zhing la gzhan gyi 'bru'i phung po'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-20: nas dang gro'i phung po la ri dvags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-21: bya za ba la de de la dga' ba dang mgu ba bskyed na de yang sbyin pa yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-22: gang bzo'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-23: gang yang lus mi bde bas 'jigs pa'i phyir sman pa la sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-24: gang yang slong ba rnams la spyos brgyad de tshig pa za bar byas nas sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-25: gang yang sbyin pa byin pa 'di'i rnam par smin pa yod dam med ces the tshom za na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:459b-26: gang sbyin pa byin nas gdung ba dang 'gyod pas gdungs na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-1: pa byin nas gang bdag las khyer ba thams cad kyis tshe phyi ma la slar sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam du 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-2: gang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'di ni bdag nyid kyis spyad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-3: sems can gzhan gang la yang ma gyur cig snyam du de ltar sems bskyed na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-4: gang lang tshol bab pas sbyin pa byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-9: gnad du phog pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-10: snad pa dang 'chi ba'i mya ngan du gyur pa na sangs rgyas pa la dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-11: dad pa med par rtsa lag rnams kyis byed du bcug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-12: sbyin gnas rnams la sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-13: gang yul gzhan na gnas na yang yul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-14: gnas ga ge mo zhes bya ba na bdag sbyin bdag tu grags par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-15: snyam du grags pa'i rgyur sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460a-16: gang yang kha zas gtong mi phod pa la 'jig rten pa mi dga' bar mthong nas sbyin phod pa'i nyes pa ni 'jig rten gyis bzod do snyam ste sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-0: gang yang bud med snying du sdug ste chung mar blang bar bya ba'i don du bud med kyi gzhi las @460b mdza' bshes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-1: gnyen 'dab dang 'brel ba'i phyogs la nor bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-8: du ku la'i ras la sogs pas mgu bar byed na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-9: gang yang 'di ltar bdag la nor ni mang du yod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-11: bdag gis gang rigs pa la gtang bar bya'o snyam ste sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-12: gang yang tshe 'dir byin pas 'jig rten pha rol tu rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-15: zang zing 'dod pas dbul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-17: sdug phongs pa gos dengs shing dri ma can rnams bkol te bor la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-18: phyug pa rgya chen po thob pa dag la sbyin pa byin na de yang sbyin pa yongs su ma dag pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-20: rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni sbyin pa byin yang yongs su ma dag pa yin par lta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-22: de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni tshva sgo can gyi zhing la sa bon ngan pa btab pa'i myu gu skyes pa bzhin du lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-23: sbyin pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni med pa ma yin mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-25: sa bon gyis nyes pas me tog dang 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:460b-29: skyes bu la la zhig gang 'dod pa'i sa bon khyer te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-0: @461a *// ma rmos ma bsal ba'i zhing la btab na de'i sa bon sa la gnas pa de la char pa bab nas bangs na gdon mi za bar myu gu skye nus par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-1: 'on kyang me tog dang 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-3: de bzhin du sbyin pa de'i rnam par dbye ba de yang bsam pa dang sbyor ba kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pas 'bras bu rnam par smin pa grung por mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-4: de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas thal mo sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-5: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa dang mthun pa'i rnam par smin pa skye dgu rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bgyid pa ni bstan lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-8: ji ltar tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-9: tshul khrims dang ldan pa la stsal na sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa chab mi 'tshal ba lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-11: drang srong chen po khyod sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa nyon cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-13: dad pas gang cung zad ci byin pa de dag thams cad ni sbyin pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-15: gang yang 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pas snod la mi rtog par ma bslangs par yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461a-16: ngan pa'i tshul khrims 'chal ba la dad pa bskyed nas mig phye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-0: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems @461b kyis sbyin pa byin na drang srong chen po de ni sbyin bdag yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-2: gzhan yang sbyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-8: yul gzhan du 'gro ba la dus su sbyin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-15: spos dang phreng ba sbyin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-16: drang srong chen po rgyas pas gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-18: sbyin pa yongs su dag pa gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-21: sems can thams cad la dmigs shing byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gus par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-22: dul bas sbyin pa byin pa de thams cad ni yongs su dag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-23: thar par bsngos te sbyin pa byin pa ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-24: gzhan yang sbyin pa bla na med par lta ba lnga ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-27: dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-28: chos smra ba la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-29: nad pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:461b-30: pha ma la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-0: gzhan yang sbyin pa chen por 'gyur ba ni rgyal po rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug las nyams pa la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa @462a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-4: nad pa la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-5: rgyal pos spangs nas gzhan na yang nyam nga zhing srog chad la khad pa 'chi la thug pa las gsos na sbyin pa chen po yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-6: na ba la sman byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-7: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la dus su sbyin pa byin na 'bras bu chen po yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-8: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-9: shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-10: rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-11: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni sbyin pa chen po yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-12: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba bya rog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-14: ri dvags la sogs pa la mi 'jigs pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-15: gang la gang dgos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-16: mi bdog pa de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni sbyin pa chen po yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-18: de ltar na sbyin pa byin pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-19: sbyin pa chen po yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-20: sbyin pa yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa yongs su dag par bsgom par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462a-21: sems can gang dag gzhan dag gis da ltar bskul nas dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-0: sbyin pa yongs su dag pa @462b 'di la rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba de dag mtshungs par bsod nams skyed pa po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-2: de ltar na gang rjes su yid rang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-3: gang bskul ba de dag thams cad bsod nams skyed pa por mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-5: gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-6: ji ltar sbyin pa'i bsod nams zad par 'gyur zhes khyod kyis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-8: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-11: gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-12: da ltar bzhugs pa la mchod pa byed pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni mtshungs mnyam zhing 'dra'o zhes nga 'chad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gzugs chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-15: chos gzugs kyi skus rab tu phye ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-16: gang la la zhig nga 'dug pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-17: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod na sems mtshungs pa'i phyir 'di gnyis la bsod nams kyi khyad par cung zad kyang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-21: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos ris su gtogs pa rnams la bsgo ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:462b-22: nga'i gang gis kyang deng phyin chad srog gcod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-0: @463a *// ma byin par len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-1: 'dod pa log par g-yem pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-5: tshig kyal pa 'byin par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-8: log par lta ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bsgo la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-9: de la mi la las rgyal pos bsgo ba de thos nas bsgo ba rnams rjes su bsrungs na; rgyal po de'i lus la mchod pa byed pa ma yin mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-10: rgyal po ngas bsgo ba bzhin du de dag gis kyang byas so snyam ste dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-11: de dag rgyal po des bstan cing bsgo ba rab tu bsrung zhing srog gcod pa la sogs pa kun bsrung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-12: gang dag rgyal po des bstan cing bsgo ba mi bsrung zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-13: mi dge ba'i las la sbyor ba de dag mi dge ba'i las byed pas tshe 'di la rgyal po de las sdug bsngal rjes su 'thob par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-14: de 'di nas shi ba'i dus byas nas kyang log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-16: de bzhin du gang dag gis nga la gzugs kyi skur mthong la bslab pa rnams rjes su mi bsrung ba de dag gis ci 'thob par 'gyur zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463a-17: de dag gis log par lta ba bskyed nas lhas byin bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-0: @463b gang dag nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na bslab pa rnams bsrung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-1: mchod pa yang byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas mchog dam par shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-3: de ltar nga mchog tu phyin te sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pas ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la ming bsgrags pas kyang bslab pa phun sum tshogs par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-6: gang la la zhig nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-7: 'das pa'i 'og tu mchod pa byed pa de nga 'dug pa la mchod pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-9: sems can de dag bsod nams lhag par bya ba gang byed pa thams cad ni bsod nams chen po'i 'phen pa byang chub tu 'gyur bar byas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-13: chu ngogs kyi 'dam bu stug po'i nang du me btang na char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chus de zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-15: de bzhin du sbyin bdag sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po sdud par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-16: sbyin pa'i tshogs de yang sbyin pa po nyid kyi rgyud la dad pa'i char pa bab na sbyin pa po nyid kyi rgyud la gsog par 'gyur mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-17: sbyin pa byin pa de yang phung por gnas pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:463b-19: phyogs na gnas pa mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-0: @464a *// gang yang 'di ltar sbyin pa byin pa de'i byin pa de ni sbyin pa po de la grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-1: de nas sbyin pa po des bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa de mthong yang bsod nams de khong du mi chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-6: bu ram shing ma btsir ba de la khu ba mi dmigs kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-7: btsir nas dmigs te rgun 'bru dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-8: bu ram shing de'i khu ba de yang phung por gnas pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-10: phyogs na gnas par mi snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-11: khu ba de ni rgun 'bru re re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-12: bu ram shing gi dum bu re re'i nang du 'dus pa yang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-14: de bzhin du sbyin pa byin pa de yang sbyin pa po'i lag pa'i rtse mo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-16: brang la rnam par mi gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-17: sbyin pa de rnam par smin pa mi 'byin pa yang ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-18: sbyin bdag 'dor ba yang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-20: bu ram shing bor na khu ba de dmigs par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du sbyin bdag med na sbyin pa'i rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-21: tshe'i 'du byed ma btang bar yang sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa snang ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-25: shing n+ya gro dha'i sa bon kha ma bus par shin tu snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464a-26: de bzhin du sbyin pa 'phel ba las 'bras bu grung por 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-3: tshong pa la la zhig rdzas kyi tshogs nyung ngu zhig khyer te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-4: yul gzhan gyi grong khyer du song nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-5: tshong 'dus khyad par can du rang gi rdzas nor chen po rgyas par bsgyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-6: de'i nor de nyung ngu las mang por gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-7: sbrang rtsi'i sbrang mas me tog ma rungs par byas pa ltar sbyin bdag gi rnam par smin pa yang rgya cher gsog par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-9: sprin ni ma 'ongs pa'i char pa'i chu rab tu 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-10: de bzhin du sbyin bdag kyang rnam par smin pa 'phen par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-12: de ltar sbyin bdag bsod nams 'phen par byed cing sbyin pa sbyin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-13: de'i 'bras bu la yang spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-14: de bas na len pas sbyin par shes par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-16: bsod nams zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol tu rdzogs par byed pa'am mthu rtsal thob pas bsrung ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-17: de bas na bsod nams zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-18: 'jig rten pha rol nas gcig nas gcig tu lus dang longs spyod skyed par byed pas de'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol gyi zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ni bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-22: rnam par shes pa lus su ji ltar 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:464b-23: rnam par shes pa 'di ji ltar na lus la chags pa bskyed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-0: @465a *// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-4: rgyal po grong khyer gyi dbus na 'dug na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pas thog ma nyid du 'obs rko zhing rdzas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-7: skyes bu dpa' bo sdud par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-8: rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas gzhon nu rnams la smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-10: ba glang mo chang gis ra ro bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-11: rigs dang nags na gnas pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-12: zhang blon la sogs pa thams cad sdud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-13: dmag mi rnams kyang nor gyis bsdus nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-14: 'di skad du thams cad kyang 'thab 'dod par gyis te so so'i lag cha thogs la ral gri phyung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-15: nyin mtshan ma nyal bar 'dug cig ces bsgos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-16: pha rol gyi dmag rta dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-19: 'di ltar rgyal po des bdag gi dmag dbugs 'byin cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-20: pha rol gyi dpung rang gi bsod nams zad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-23: pham par ma gyur gyi bar du 'khor la glags mi rnyed par srung bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-24: drang srong chen po; de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po lus kyi grong khyer du song nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465a-25: skye mched kyi grong khyer la mi rtag pa'i ngo bor gnas par mthong nas de'i tshe dad pa'i 'obs rko bar byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-3: chos kyi glang po che rgyags par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-4: ye shes kyi rta yang zhon zhing rgyug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-5: skye mched kyi grong khyer la 'di skad ces bag yod par ci bya ba dus su gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-6: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi dpung thub par dka' ba mi rtag pa'i dmag dpag tu med pa 'ong gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-7: de myur du sbyin pa'i go cha gyon cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-8: ye shes kyi mtshon cha thogs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-10: khrel yod pa'i sgyogs sbyor cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-13: gtong ba'i srung ma zhog cig ces bskul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-14: de dag kyang pha rol gyi dmag nye bar gnas pa de dang phan tshun mi mthun pas 'bros so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-15: de dag dang mi mthun pas skye mched kyi grong khyer de zhi gnas rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po de lus kyi grong khyer bor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-16: de yul la phyogs nas 'bros so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-17: rnam par shes pa bros nas lus dang dbang po'i tshogs khams kyi sbrul gyis gang bas skye mched drug zhig nas bdag po med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-18: yid brtan du mi rung ba'i lus kyi grong khyer 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-20: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyal pos lus kyi grong khyer bor nas lus gzhan yongs su 'dzin par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-21: de ltar na rnam par shes pa ni rgyal po ltar blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:465b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-2: rnam par shes pa bsod nams su nye bar mchi ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-3: bsod nams ma lags pa nye bar mchi ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-4: mi g-yo bar nye bar mchi ba'i lus ji ltar rab tu 'tshal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-5: rnam par shes pa 'di nyid kyis bdag gi lus 'di yongs su btang ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-6: ma btang snyam du ji ltar rab tu 'tshal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-11: skyes bu rgya mtsho chen po rgal bar 'dod pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-12: gzings chen po'i steng du 'dug nas chu'i nang du zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-13: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu rlabs rgyud mar 'byung bas dkrugs pa mthon dman can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-14: kumbhi ra ma rungs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-16: chu srin byis pa gsod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-17: sbrul yod pa'i chu de'i tshu rol gyi 'gram nas rlung gis phul nas 'bang mi dgos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-18: gnod pa med la bde bar gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-19: pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-20: chu bo'i klung rab tu 'jigs pa de las thar bas gzings de la dga' ba bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-21: gzings 'dis bdag mtsho chen po 'di las brgal to snyam bsams nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-22: gzings de la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466a-23: gzings de la rab tu mchod pa byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-0: de bzhin du gang bsod nams byas pa'i sems can 'di nas shi 'phos pa de'i @466b rnam par shes pa de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-1: lus 'dis bdag bde 'gro lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung ba dang ldan pas bdag don yod pa mi'i lus thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-2: lus 'dis bdag ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-3: 'dis lhar skye ba'i gnas yongs su bzung ngo zhes 'di ltar lus de la dga' ba bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-4: bdag gis 'di la mchod pa legs par bya'o snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-5: phyis lus de gzings bzhin du bor nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-6: gang rang gi lus kyis bsod nams ma byas pa de'i rnam par shes pa de ni ji ltar skyes bu gzings rul bas mtsho chen po de'i nang du 'bying zhing zhig ste ma rungs par gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-7: skyes bu de yang nyam thag ste gzings zhig pa des 'jigs bzhin du 'gram du phyin nas kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-9: stag yod pa'i 'jigs sar phyin par gyur nas de la 'di skad ces zer ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-10: gzings rul pas nyon mongs kyi steng du log par sod nas mtsho chen po'i chu rlabs kyis dkrugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-11: sbrul gyis klongs par zhugs so zhes gzings de la de skad smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:466b-12: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i 'di bsod nams ma yin pa byas pa'i lus la brten nas ngan song gi sar song nas lus de la 'di skad zer ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-0: sdig pa'i lus 'dis ci zhig rnyed na sdig pa can gyi lus mngon par grub nas bdag khur lta bus @467a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-2: bdag lus rul pa 'di'i rgyus ngan song du mngon par phyogs shing zhugs te mchil bas nya zin pa bzhin no snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-3: de ltar rnam par shes pa de legs par byas pa'i bsod nams kyis gzings bzang po bzhin du 'khor ba las rgal bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-4: bsod nams ma yin pas ni log par ltung par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-5: de ltar na rnam par shes pas bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-6: bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i lus rnam pa 'di gnyis rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-7: yang rnam par shes pas lus 'di yongs su btang nas gzhan lus gnyis par 'gro zhing nye bar 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-8: de mngal na gnas pa'i tshe zhag bdun gyi bar du rnam par shes pas bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'dir 'ongs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-10: bdag gis las 'di byas so zhes de dran nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-11: de legs par byas pa'i las kyis dga' bzhin du 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-12: de rum na gnas pa na de'i ma la mtshan ma gsum 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-15: de'i bzhin rnyi rnyi po ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-16: bzhin lha'i kha dog lta bur 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-17: rkang pa g-yas pa la rab tu gnon la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-18: dku g-yas pa la lan du mar nyug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-19: de gos dkar po dang rab tu mdzes pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-20: bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467a-21: ma'i gzugs de lta bur blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-1: gang bsod nams ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa bskyed par gyur pa de zhag bdun gyi bar du bdag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-2: sdig pa'i las ni 'di byas so zhes de lta bu dran par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-3: de de lta bu dran nas yid mi bde ba skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-4: yid mi bde ba skyes pa de'i ma la ltas mang du 'byung bar lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-5: lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-7: lus la sems pas khyab par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-8: yang dang yang du bzhin khro gnyer sdud par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-9: gang tshun chad sems can de mngal du skyes par gyur pa de tshun chad khyim der nyon mongs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-12: sems can de btsas pa'i tshe yang na ni ma 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-13: yang na ni bdag nyid mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma rungs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-15: de lta bu ni bsod nams ma yin pas nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can du blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-18: 'di la rnam par shes pa de thog ma mngal du skyes pa'i tshe ci dran /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:467b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-2: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir skye bo mdza' ba 'du bas gang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-3: mchog tu yid du 'ong ba'i bsod nams byed pa'i sems can gyis gang bar mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-4: lha'i shes pa'i snang bas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma rjes su dran no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-5: rjes su dran zhing rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba bskyed de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-7: de ltar rjes su dran nas ma de la chags par mi byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-8: 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-10: 'di ltar yang skye ba dang 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal te 'khor bas ni chog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-11: yongs su 'dzin pa 'dis kyang chog go snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-12: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-13: drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-15: sems can de ni mi chags na 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-18: thams cad de lta bu ni ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-19: rnam par shes pa de ni gzugs med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-22: gang rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa med par gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-23: 'khor bar mi skye ba de lta bu'i gnas med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-24: bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-26: mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba thams cad de ltar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468a-28: de dag ni 'di ltar lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-0: rnam par shes pa @468b gang de ltar sems pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i shas che bar lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-1: lus kyi shas che bas ni mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-2: rnam par shes pa ni tshor bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-3: rnam par shes pa ni sems par byed pa ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-5: drang srong chen po khyod kyis rnam par shes pa de de ltar khong du chud par bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-8: nyon mongs gsog par byed pa po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-9: shes dang mi shes shes pa po //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-11: lta dang nga rgyal ma rig dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-12: rnam par shes pa kun la yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-13: rnam par shes pa med par ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-15: rnam par shes pa med par ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-18: gcig min 'khor lo shing rta bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-19: skyes bu mnyam du 'du ba ni //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-24: 'khor lo gnyis su ldan pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-25: theg pa dag gis bcings byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-26: shing rta zhes ni yongs su grags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-27: de ltar lus kyi shing rta yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-29: de las dbang po ldan 'gyur te //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-31: gnad dang mtshams su sbyor ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-32: de ltar rtsa dang 'jing chu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:468b-33: skra dang rus pa so dang mgo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-1: mo pags pas mdog byas dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-2: rgyu ma glo ba mkhal ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-3: snying dang 'tsher pa tshil bu dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-4: thams cad mnyam du 'dus pa las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-5: lus ni shin tu gnas pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-6: de la khams ni lus can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-7: sems las dngos po kun 'byung bas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-11: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa 'di ni phra ba /
