K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-27: sems can dmyal bar nye bar mchi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-28: yi dvags su nye bar mchi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-29: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su nye bar mchi ba'i rang bzhin ji ltar blta bar bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-30: ji ltar lhar nye bar mchi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-31: ji ltar mir nye bar mchi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-32: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469a-33: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gang lags par blta bar bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba @469b gang dag gis lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-2: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-4: yi dvags su skye bar 'gyur ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-6: drang srong chen po khyod sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-10: yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul 'di ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i yul ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-12: tshangs pa la sogs pa 'og min la thug pa rnams kyi ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-13: 'di ni nyan thos rnams kyi skabs kyang ma yin na sems can gzhan rnams kyi lta gal yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-15: gang dri ma gsum spangs pa'i chos nyid dang po thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-16: nga'i bstan pa la rgyun du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul ni 'di yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-18: drang srong thams cad kyis ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-19: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-20: drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-21: bdag ni rgas 'khogs gtugs pas da 'bras bu rnams la btsal ba'i rngo mi thogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-22: bdag da khur chen po bskur ba'i rngo mi thogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-25: tha ba thams cad spangs pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-26: bdag deng slan char slob ma dang bcas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:469b-27: g-yog dang bcas te gsum la skyabs su mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-1: lha'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba gang du 'gyur ba de bshad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-4: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-5: lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-6: ltas gang yin pa ngas bshad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-13: mang du byas pa dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas na phreng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-15: de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de lus dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos kyis bsgos pa'i me tog bzhin du snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-17: de la me tog gi char mang po rab tu bab nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-18: de'i lus la me tog kha dog sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-19: de'i rtsa lag snying du sdug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang me tog thogs shing mya ngan byed par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-20: de'i bzhin gyi mdog snum par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-21: de'i mig ha cang btsums pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-22: ha cang phye ba yang ma yin par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-23: rkang lag legs par brkyang nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-24: de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'di lta bu'i rtags 'di dag 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-25: 'di lta bu'i ltas kyang mthong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470a-26: khang pa brtsegs pa me tog sna tshogs rab tu dpyangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-0: me tog tha dad pas mdzes par byas @470b pa bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba mthong nas rtsa lag rnams la 'di skad ces smra ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-1: bdag gi rmi lam na khang pa brtsegs pa lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-2: me tog gi lda ldi dpyangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-4: bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba de lta bu mthong ngo zhes bdag gis rtsa lag de dag la smras nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-5: de dag gis kyang phreng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye bar rig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-6: de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas phreng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye ba na pha dang ma 'dus par mthong nas skye ba yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-7: phreng ba thogs pa de dag kyang gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis sprod par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-10: 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-11: de la de dag gi rnam par shes pa phan tshun 'dres shing dga' ba tsam gyis non pas 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-12: de dag khu ba 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-14: lha de dag ni lha mos mngal na zhag bdun du 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-15: zhag bdun 'das pa nas dku g-yas pa nas 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-17: de de'i mngal nas byung nas lha'i me tog dri rab tu zhim pa mchog tu yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs pa brgyus pa'i phreng ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-20: de'i phreng ba'i dri rab tu zhim pa'i ngad rlung gis ba das nas phyogs kun tu dpag tshad tsam du 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-21: phreng ba de la kha dog bdun yod pa 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:470b-28: padma r'a ga las lhag pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-0: blta na sdug pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba de dag de ma shi bar @471a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-1: du ma rnyis par thogs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-2: de'i phyir phreng thogs zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-4: phreng thogs kyi lha de dag gi gnas de na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-5: shing ljon pa ha cang yang mi ring ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-6: ha cang yang mi thung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-7: 'bras bu sna tshogs ha cang yang mi skyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-8: ha cang yang mi mngar la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-9: bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba'i ro bro ba mang po bzang po lha'i ro bro ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dag yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-11: shing de dag gi 'bras bu de dag gi tshad ni shing tog bil pa tsam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-12: de dag gi nang nas lha rnams gang dang gang za bar 'dod pa'i zas de dang de dag la nye bar gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-13: lha de dag ni 'bras bu za bar lta'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-14: kham gyis za ba'i zas can ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-16: lha de dag gi phyogs ni rab tu rno ba'i tsher ma'i bag med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-17: me tog gis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-19: gser dang dngul gyi phreng ba sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-20: yid tsam ser ba lta bur snang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-22: gnas de na phreng ba thogs pa'i lha de dag lha'i bu mo mchog tu 'bar ba'i gos dang rgyan can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-25: pu shu'i ngos la rgyu ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-26: bde ba dang yid bde ba mchog dang ldan pa dag dang gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-27: de na de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo nyis stong thub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-28: de nas tshe zad pa'i ltas 'byung ba ni shing gang gi drung na 'dug 'dug pa'i shing de lo ma rnyis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471a-30: me tog dang dri yang med par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-0: sems can @471b de yang shing drung de na mi dga' ba rnyed par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-1: de'i phreng ba sngon ma rnyis pa de yang rnyis par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-2: lha'i 'jig rten gyi rlung bsil zhing bde bar ldang ba de yang dro bar ldang bar 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-3: de'i gnas de dag mthong nas lha'i bu mo de dag nga ro gcig tu snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-4: sems can de yang mtho ris kyi grong khyer lha'i shing dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-6: 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-7: lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang 'dre ba yongs su btang nas bsod nams zad bar 'gyur ba 'di ni mtho ris kyi nyes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-9: de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis de'i mtha' bskor nas nyam thag pa chen po'i sgrar dus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-11: mi rtag pa 'di ni snying rje med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-12: 'di ltar snying la dga' ba skyes shing 'khod 'khod pa las mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par mtho ris nas lhung ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-14: lha gzhon nu da myur du mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-15: ces mya ngan byed pa na rims drag pos btab nas de rims drag pos non te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-16: de'i lus gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-17: lus 'bar bas gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-18: de'i 'bar ba de khar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-19: de nas shi 'phos nas pha dang ma 'dus pa mthong bas skye ba yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-21: phreng thogs su nye bar 'gro ba'i lha'i bu de 'di ltar skye bar lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:471b-22: ma'i mngal na gnas ba'i tshe ltas 'byung ba ni mngal na gnas pa na me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-2: 'bras bu sna tshogs pa 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-3: nags tshal sna tshogs stug po nyams dga' bar 'dod par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-4: bde ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-5: lus la na ba med par mngal na 'dzin par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-6: rmi lam na bsod nams sna tshogs kyi tshong 'dus me tog gi phreng ba dpyangs pa'i grong khyer mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-7: 'di dag ni de'i mas ltas mthong ngo; ;drang srong chen po /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-8: gzhan yang lha gzhon nu de btsas nas phreng ba thogs pa'i lha las shi 'phos pas shin tu dga' ba chen po skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-9: gos dkar po la dga' bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-12: 'dod pa la rab tu chags shing 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-16: phra ba'i gos la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-17: kun dga' ra ba la dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-18: pha rol 'byor pa mthong na 'dod pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-20: 'di dag ni phreng thogs kyi lha las mir skye ba'i snga ltas su blta ba dag go ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-21: bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-23: gzhan yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'i ltas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-24: 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas su blta ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-27: mgon med pa la zas bzang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-29: kun 'thung ba'i chu grang mo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472a-35: khron chu byin nas dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-0: @472b yid rab tu dga' zhing 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-1: nyon mongs pa'i 'bar ba med pa'i lus su gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-4: rdul dang dri ma chags par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-5: de'i lus la nyams pa'i tshor ba mi 'byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-7: rtsa lag dang bral zhing gdung ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-8: de bkres pa dang skom pas nyen par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-9: de'i lus bskum pa dang smyang ba la sogs pas sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-11: yul las yongs su nyams pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-12: de'i dbang po zhum par mi 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-13: de lta bu na mtho ris kyi bde ba dang ldan zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-14: de'i lus yongs su btang nas rnam par shes pa da rab tu dga' bar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skyed mos tshal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-15: nags tshal stug po'i nang du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-16: de 'chi gar lha'i ris mthong nas bzhin me tog padma lta bur 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-17: de'i kha nas dri zhim po 'byung bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-18: de la me tog sna tshogs dri dang ldan pa'i rlung rjes su mthun pa dang ldang bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:472b-19: de shi nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du pha ma 'dus nas skyed mos tshal na rtse zhing 'dod ba myong bas rgyags dregs nas lag pa g-yas pas lha mo'i lte ba la reg par mthong nas de'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa lha mo de'i phang par skye ba yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-0: de zhag bdun 'das nas dri ma med pa'i rna @473a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-1: cha mgul ba'i mgo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nur mngon par 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-5: 'dod pa'i longs spyod bskyed nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-7: de la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi sa phyogs ni dngul dang ldong ros rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs kyis spras shing mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-8: lha mo brgya stong gis legs par brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-9: lha'i gnas mtho ba rang bzhin gyis mdzes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-10: reg na bde ba'i rlung ldang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-12: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de dag gi skyed mos tshal dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gru bzhi lham pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-13: nor bu'i sgron mas snang bar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-14: shing gi yal ga dang rtse mo la dpag bsam gyi shing gi ras bcos bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-15: rgya dar la'i lda ldi dpyangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-16: nags tshal gyi bar 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-17: khyim gyi bar na rtag tu pi wang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-22: lha'i gnas na gnas pa de dag zas kham gyi zas can de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-23: dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-27: yon tan phun sum tshogs par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-28: de dag re re la yang gser gzhong gnyis gnyis yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-29: de na kha zas gang 'dod pa de ni de'i phun sum tshogs pa gzhong pa de las 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473a-30: lha'i me tog gi khu ba ro dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-0: de ni @473b me tog gi chang zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-2: chang de ni dri rab tu zhim pa mchog tu bde ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-3: bsil la dris kyang ra ro ba mngon par 'grub na 'thungs pas lta ci smos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-4: de na lha gzhon nur ro bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-6: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de dag gi gzhal med khang ni mdzes byed ces bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-7: rtag tu me tog rgyas pa'i 'khri shing gis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-10: rdo rje 'bar ba'i ka ba brgya stong gis phyogs phyogs shin tu brtan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-12: gdang ba bting bas phyogs shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-13: lha mo bzor byas pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-14: steg cing 'jo ba'i rjes su chags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-15: lha'i gos 'bar zhing rnam par mdzes pas spud spud pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-17: bung ba'i tshogs kyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-18: gzugs rab tu che zhing shin tu gzhon sha chags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-22: 'jam zhing rtse bas rgyags pa'i shas che la rab tu sgeg pa sha stag gis bskor cing gang ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-23: gnas de'i ka ba ni gser chu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-24: dngul chus rnam pa bris pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-25: dar gyi rgyal mtshan dpyangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-28: gzhal med khang de dag ni 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-33: rgyal po chen po bzhi pa de dag lha'i 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-35: rtse ba myong zhing rab tu dga' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:473b-36: dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-4: lha'i kha zas za bas dbang po tshim zhing bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-6: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i ris de na lha gzhon nu de dag lag pa ring zhing sha rgyas pa glang po rgyags pa'i tshul du 'gro ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-7: skyes bu stong gi stobs dang rtsal yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-8: lha'i lus shin tu 'jam pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-9: de dag gi dri chang gi shas che bas dpag tshad khor yug chang drir phyogs par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-10: lha de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo bzhi stong thub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-11: bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-12: de dag thams cad bde ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-15: lha'i ris de na skal ba bzang po can gser dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis brgyan pa dag nags kyi phreng bas mdzes par brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-16: dga' ba bskyed pa la sogs pa'i skyed mos tshal bzang po dri nga ba med pa rnams na snying dga' ba dang ldan par gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-17: de dag de na gnas pa na me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing nor bu gser gyis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-18: shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-20: nor bu'i them skas kyis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-21: lha'i bu mo brgya stong glu snyan pa len pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-22: nor bu'i snod rnams bdag nyid sgra 'byin pa'i rjes su chags pa na de dag gnas gnas pa las de dag bsod nams zad pas tshe zad par 'gyur ba'i ltas gnyis 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474a-23: de thog mar grib ma mi snang bar 'gyur zhing me tog las dri mi 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-0: lha'i bu mo @474b dang kun smra ba'i sgra snyan pa mi thos pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-1: yang lha gzhon nu de lha yul pa'i lha'i gnas rnams su 'du zhing mi 'gro ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-2: lha'i gnas lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis gang ba yal ga'i rtse mo la do shal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-4: me tog gi phreng ba dpyangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-5: nags tshal gyi bar gyi bya khu byug rgyags pa'i sgra 'byin pa de dag lha'i bu mo'i tshogs ngu zhing gos dri ma can gyon nas sa'i steng na 'dre ldog cing snying rje rje ltar lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-6: sa'i steng de na 'dre ldog pas me tog gi bla res brgyan pa'i sa phyogs dag na yang dga' ba mi rnyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-7: de dag gi lus la rngul 'byung zhing de dag mig mi 'dzum pa las mig 'dzum par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-8: nya chu'i gnas nas phyung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdungs pa bzhin du phan tshun du 'dre ldog cing gcig bu sa la gnas par mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-9: lha'i bu mo de dag gis bskor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-10: snying rje rje ltar lta zhing skad mthun par ngu ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-14: kyi hud gzhon nu'i mchog de phyogs gang du song /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-15: lus che la rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa; 'gram pa che la mdzes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-17: skyed mos tshal sna tshogs kyi bar na rgyu ba des bdag cag bor zhing lha yul pa'i lha'i gnas yid du 'ong ba yang bor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-19: de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-20: rnam pa sna tshogs legs par bkod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-21: lha yi nags kyis shin tu brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:474b-22: zas dang dus ston gang gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-2: ka ba bzhi dang rab ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-3: bsod nams kyi ni tshong 'dus mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-4: lha yi bud med gang bas dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-6: bor nas mi rtag 'di yis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-7: sdug pa dag ni zin te song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-8: de ltar lha'i bu mo de dag gis bskor te mchi ma zag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-9: skad 'gags shing thag ring po nyid nas lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-10: me tog gtor nas 'di skad ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-13: legs par byed pa'i 'jig rten mi'i 'jig rten du song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-14: dad pa'i gshol gyis bsod nams kyi zhing rmod par gyur cig ces 'dzer to; ;de ltar sems pas kun tu khyab pa'i lus yongs su btang bar bdag gis rig nas de rims drag po mi bzad pas btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-15: rims drag po des de'i lus bshig nas de'i lus mar gyi thigs pa rdo tshan la thim pa bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-16: de'i lus yongs su rnyis nas 'drud pa zhes bya ba'i rlung gis rab tu 'das te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-17: rlung des de'i lus stong du gtor nas phye ma zhib mo bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil nas lhung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-18: de ltar lhung nas mi'i srid par skye ba yongs su len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-19: pha ma 'dus pa mthong nas rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ma'i mngal du skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-20: de thog mar skye zhing ma'i mngal du gnas pa na mtshan ma 'byung ba ni de'i ma de kha zas la rab tu dga' bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475a-21: gos dmar po 'tsher ma la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-0: skye bo sna tshogs phal @475b po che la blta 'dod cing rtsa lag dang mdza' ba tsam du 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-1: de de'i mngal du zhugs nas mngal la tshor ba skye bar mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-5: de de'i mngal na lag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-7: mgo shin tu yongs su rdzogs par grub nas de btsas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-8: gzi brjid dang ldan zhing mthong na rab tu dga' bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-9: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i gtam thos na dga' ba skye bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-10: sbyin pa la dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-12: shin tu dri zhim pa'i cha byad 'dzin cing skyed mos tshal la dga' bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-13: bud med la dbang po mang po mngon par rab tu chags par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-17: sil snyan gyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-18: mdog snum zhing sngo sangs por 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-19: mig lha'i bee d'urya sngon po ltar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-21: 'di dag ni lus dang sems kyi rgyud kyi bag chags kyis bsgos pas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas shi 'phos pa'i ltas su blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-23: gang la srog gcod pa spangs nas dad cing dad pas sbyin pa sbyin zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-24: ma byin par mi len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:475b-29: yo byad kyi khyad par spangs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-0: bee d'urya la sogs pa rdzas thams @476a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-1: cad rab tu sbyin pa la bsten pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-3: mang du byas nas dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-4: rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyi me tog gi lda ldi 'bul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-5: mchod rten la mngon par phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i rnam par smin pas tshe yongs su zad pa'i dus na lus la nyon mongs pa chung bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-7: dri nga ba rnam par spangs nas rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su dran zhing 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rab tu dad pa'i ltas mthong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-9: bzhin gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-12: mid pa nas sgra ngar ngar po 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-13: de'i lus la dbugs rgod par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-15: dbang po 'gyur ba ma yin yan lag dang nying lag kun tu chad par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-17: mal gyi steng nas 'dre zhing ldog pa byed par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-18: dman pa'i tshig lta bu smra bar mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-19: rims nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-20: pha rol pos dug byin pas gnod par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-21: me tog dang 'bras bu la brkam pa'i phyir shing la 'dzegs nas lhung bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476a-22: yid du mi 'ong ba'i kha zas zos te kha zas ma zhu bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-0: gal te mi'i phung po yongs su btang nas kyang lha'i nang gi rnam par shes pas sum cu @476b rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-1: khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-4: dngul stong gis rnam par brgyan cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-5: shin tu rnam par phye bas spras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-7: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-9: ba dan gyis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-11: sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-12: gnas sna tshogs kyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-13: shing 'dab chags pas brgyan pa'i nags tshal gyi nang na 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-14: tsandan sbrul gyi snying po'i chus chag chag btab pas 'dam du gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-15: lha'i nor bu'i sgron ma'i phreng bas brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-16: bud med 'bar ba sna tshogs rnam par mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-21: do shal sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-22: mjes par byas pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-24: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris de na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-25: lha'i bu de dag mchog gi skyed mos tshal du song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-26: rtse dga' la dga' mgur spyod cing 'dod pas rgyags myos nas de dag skyed mos tshal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-27: nags tshal gyi bar du 'gro zhing dga' ba bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:476b-28: sems can de'i rnam par shes pa de bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-0: sems can des lha dang lha mo khri gcig gi steng na 'dug pa mthong nas rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis myur ba myur bar nor bu skud pa la brgyus pa 'phyugs pa @477a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-2: sems can de 'jug pa'i tshe lha mo de'i lag mthil gnyis nas me tog 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-3: sems can des me tog de mthong nas 'jug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-4: lha mo de lha la dga' ba dang bde ba'i yid kyis lta zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-5: lag pa gnyis kyis me tog de mnyes nas de'i lag pa phrad pa'i rkyen gyis lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-6: de skyes pa'i tshe lha mo de lha la lta zhing gzhon nu skyes kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-9: pha ma de gnyis yid dga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-10: gzhon nu de zhag bdun 'das nas rna cha sna tshogs mgul ba 'phyang bar mngon par 'grub bo; ;de zhag bdun 'das nas 'di lta bu dran par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-11: bdag che ge mo zhig nas 'dir 'ongs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-12: 'di gnyis ni bdag gi pha ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-13: bdag gis dge ba'i las ni 'di byas so snyam du de ltar sems shing nye bar rtog pa na dga' ba chen po skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-14: de dga' bas myos nas rgyags pas 'dod pa la sred par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-15: rgyang ring po nyid nas lha'i gnas yangs pa nye bar gnas pa de des mthong nas de la mngon par dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-16: de lha'i 'gros kyi tshul gyis glang po che rgyags pa'i 'gros ltar 'gro ba brang che ba lag pa ring zhing rab tu 'phyang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-19: rked pa gzhu'i chang zung ltar phra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-20: sgal tshigs rim bzhin du 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477a-21: brla chu shing gi sdong bu ltar mkhregs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-0: @477b lha'i sma ra'i aag tshom dang sphu [*spu?] thung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-1: dri nga ba med pa'i lha'i dri yongs su bzung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-2: lus lhab lhub kyis spud pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-4: yid gcig tu brtags kyang lus mdzes pa sta [*ste?]/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-5: de lha'i gnas de na lha'i bu mo kha cig gis ni kun nas bskor cing gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-6: kha cig ni rtse dga' la dga' mgur spyod cing 'di skad ces 'dzer to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-7: jo co lha'i gnas 'dir snyun mi mnga' zhing legs par byon tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-8: khyod bdag cag gi mgon du gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-9: bdag cag lang tsho la bab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-11: nu ma gser gyi bum pa ltar 'bur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-13: gzugs sprin gyi nang nas glog 'byung ba 'dra ba dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-14: gzhal med khang chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-15: shing yongs 'du sa brtol myu gu dang yal ga chags pa mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-16: bud med drug khri lang long du gyur pa 'di dag la jo co dgyes par mdzod cig ces 'dzer to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-21: glu dbyangs 'byung ba de dag na lha'i gding bas mdzes par byas pa'i sengge'i khri mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-22: des de mthong nas rgyal bu dar mang pos bcings te spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba bzhin du de seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-23: de de na gnas pa na rtag tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-25: phyogs kun nas kyang 'di lta bu'i sgra grag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:477b-26: 'di ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-1: gling nas shi 'phos nas bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung bas lha'i gnas 'dir skyes kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-2: bdag cag de'i gan du 'dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-3: nye bar gnas nas dga' mgur spyad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-5: gar gyis rtse bar bya'o zhes sgrogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-6: de bud med drug khri dang dga' mgur spyod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-7: de dag thams cad kyang lag na me tog thogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-8: shin tu dri zhim pas dri zhim pa'i cha byad can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-9: du gu la'i ras kyi bla gos bgos pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-12: bzhin padma lta bu la zla gam lta bus mdzes par byas pa dag sbrang rtsi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-14: me tog gi chang gis rgyags shing myos pas 'khyud nas 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-15: de dag thams cad 'di skad ces bdag cag thams cad jo co 'di'i g-yog dang bsnyen bkur bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-16: khyod 'di na bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsgrubs pa'i mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi dri zhim zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-17: bde ba'i lha'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod shis pa 'di la kun tu spyod ces 'dzer to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-20: lha'i bu mo de dag lhan cig tu dga' tshal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-22: aar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478a-27: shing yongs 'du sa brtol la sogs pa'i skyed mos tshal dam pa mchog tu bde zhing bsil ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-0: @478b lha'i bya nam mkha' la 'gro zhes bya ba'i sgra snyan pas mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-3: spos kyis kun tu gang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-7: rdo'i snying po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgron ma can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-12: 'dab gshog rtse mo gser can yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-13: nor bu dang rin po che'i thig les rnam par bkra zhing bkra shis pa yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-15: bee d'urya'i mchu las sgra skad snyan pa sna tshogs mthun par sgrogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-16: me tog bkram pa rnam par phye bas brgyan pa'i phyogs rnams na lha'i bu de dag 'dod pas ngoms pas rgyun du longs spyod par 'gyur te gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-17: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas de na rdzing bu gru bzhi pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-19: chu dang ba ha cang grang ba'ang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-20: ha cang dro ba'ang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-21: yid du 'ong ba chu dri ma med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-22: padma 'dab ma brgya pa kha bye ba yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-23: ngogs shing gis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-24: me tog bkram pas chu yid du 'ong ba'i rdzing bu de dag na lha'i bu de dag lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis bskor nas chu la rtse ba rjes su myong zhing bde bar gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-26: de dag na de dag gi skyed mos tshal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-27: nags tshal gyi gam yo na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thig les rnam par bkra ba'i snod mngon par 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-28: lha'i bu de dag snod de dag 'dod pa na me tog kun da dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:478b-31: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu'i kha zas mngon par 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-2: rin po che'i snod gcig la za ba na gang gis kha cig gi kham blangs pa ni rin po che'i kha dog lta bur gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-3: kha cig gi kham blangs pa ni kha dog ser po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-5: dkar por 'gyur te kha dog gcig tu 'dra bar kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa gcig pa de dag gi rin po che'i snod de dag las kha zas kyi khyad par so so tha dad pa 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-6: de ni de dag gi sbyin pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can gyi rnam par smin par lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-7: gang gis sngar sbyin pa byin la phyis 'gyod par gyur pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa de'i kha zas kha dog ngan par 'grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-8: gang gis sngar sbyin pa byin la phyis byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis snying rje bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-9: dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pa de'i zas kyi bye brag kha dog bzang po rin po che lta bur snang ba 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-10: drang srong chen po khyod kyis de ltar las kyis 'bras bu rnam par smin par shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-12: gzhan yang sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi lha'i ris de na shi ri sha ka zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal yal ga dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-14: 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479a-15: shing brgya stong sna tshogs sdug pa stug po'i mthong na shel ltar dri ma med pa'i rdo leb shin tu byi dor byas pa phun sum tshogs pa zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba'i thub pa 'dod chags dang bral bas bsten pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-0: de na 'dod pa'i @479b longs spyod can gyi lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs mi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-2: skyed mos tshal dam pa shi ri sha ka de na me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa mang po las rtag tu lha'i gtam brjod pa'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-4: de na nyan thos dge 'dun 'dus pa'i gnas brtan ba lang bdag bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa bsam gtan la gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-8: byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-10: de zhag bdun gyi bar du dbugs phyi nang du mi rgyu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-12: de byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe 'dod na rlung mi ldang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-14: sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe sa me lce gcig tu gyur pa na yang de'i lus yungs 'bru tsam yang tshig par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-15: de'i tshigs kyis ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang phigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-16: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo stobs che ba cher 'dug pa'i shugs can rdzu 'phrul che ba dbugs kyis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'jig pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-17: rgya mtsho chen po bzhi yang skem par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-18: gtum zhing cher gdug pa'i shugs can klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kyang dge slong ba lang bdag de'i ting 'dzin gyis mthus gdug pa med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:479b-20: gnas brtan ba lang bdag skyed mos tshal shi ri sha ka na gnas shing bsam gtan la gnas par lha gzhon nu de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-0: lha'i bu mo de dag gis mthong @480a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-2: ri mo dang bcas pas gnas brtan de la dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-3: dad pa skyes nas lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-4: man da ra ba chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-6: manydzu sha ka chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-10: padma dkar pos gtor nas thal mo sbyar ba byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-11: phyag 'tshal nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis gnas brtan ba lang bdag la yongs su bskor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-12: mchod pa chen po byas nas mdun gyis bltas te gnas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-13: lha'i zas bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pas tshim par byed cing ci bder byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-14: gnas brtan ba lang bdag de lha'i bu de dag la chos ston pa ni 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-16: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-18: tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-19: ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-21: de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-22: skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-23: shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-24: rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-26: mdo sde lung gi phyogs yang dag par rab tu ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-29: de lha'i skyed mos tshal de na bsam gtan la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480a-30: thams cad bde ba dang ldan par skyed mos tshal shi ri sha ka na rten cing gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-0: gzhan yang @480b sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris de na lha'i mdun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-1: de'i ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong gser dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-5: rdo'i snying po las byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-6: tsan dan mchog shing gi snying po la sogs pa dril bu g-yer ka sgra snyan pa'i dra bas khebs par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-7: sa phyogs gser gyi bye ma brdal ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-8: lha'i mdun sa chos bzang lha'i ras rab tu sbyangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-12: lha'i rol mo khong hu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-19: pi wang rgyud gsum pa rab tu sgrogs pa ga zha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-21: ca co'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-25: khu byug gnas shing phan tshun nas sgra 'byin pa de na lha dang lha mo de dag dga' ba dang bde ba skye ba'i bzhin gyis gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-27: lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de'i sa'i ngos nor bu rin po ches rab tu spras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-28: ljang khus byugs pas mdog snum zhing be d'urya ltar dri ma med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-29: me long gi ngos lta bur byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-30: rab tu 'jam pa na spos kyi phye ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-31: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'thor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-36: sbrul gyi nyes pa yongs su spangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:480b-39: le lo rnam par spangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-0: @481a *// skar khung zla gam lta bu'i dra ba'i bu gnas reg na bde ba'i rlung gtong ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-3: yang thog chung ngu nas bde ba'i rlung gtong ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-4: rin po che'i phreng ba bres pa'i sgras rtag tu mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-5: dri rab tu zhim pa 'byung ba'i spos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-6: me tog gi sil ma 'thor ba yid du 'ong ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-9: me long gi dkyil 'khor lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-10: lha'i khyad par gyis gzugs rab tu brgyan pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-12: lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de na lha'i bu mo rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sgrogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-13: lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de ni gru bzhi lham pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-14: shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-19: nags tshal gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-20: rgyar khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-22: me tog sil ma bkram pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-25: shing yongs 'du sa rtol gyis mdzes par byas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-26: lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de ni yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad gser dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-30: rdo'i snying po las byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-31: rin po che'i phung po yongs su bzung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481a-32: gser gyi snying pos kun tu khyab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-0: ri rnam pa ngu mas nye bar bskor cing sna tshogs rnam par @481b bkra bas mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-1: ngos skyed mos tshal brgya stong gis mdzes par byas pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-2: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha mya ngan dang nad kyi rnam pa'i nyes pa las grol ba dag skyed mos tshal mchog tu dga' 'dun myong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-3: lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang der 'dus te rtse ba rjes su myong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-5: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris de na blta na sdug ces bya ba'i gzhal med khang zla ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-7: me long gi ngos ltar dri ma med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-8: dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-9: me tog gis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-11: byug pas bres pas mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-12: bud med brgya stong gis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-14: mig zur gyis blta zhing khro gnyer gyi rim pa g-yo ba'i cha byad can 'khod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-15: ngos me tog rnam pa sna tshogs phal po ches mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-16: nor bu'i skyang nul byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-17: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas bres pas mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-20: shing rta'i rmig pa reg na gser gyi rdul ldang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-21: cod pan chags shing 'byor pas mdzes par byas pa yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-23: blta na sdug ces bya ba'i gzhal med khang de la ka ba drug khri yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-26: bee d'urya las byas pa sna tshogs kyi 'phras rnam par spras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-27: shing ta ma la'i lo ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:481b-29: bdug pa'i phreng ba dri rab tu zhim par byas pa'i khyad par can no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-1: med khang de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-2: lha'i bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba gser dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-3: rdo rje'i myu gus lus mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-4: lha'i 'dod pa la rtse ba rjes su myong ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-5: glang po che dgu khri'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-6: lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu mdog gser dri ma med pa ltar ser ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-9: rna cha dri ma med pa 'gul pas lus snang bar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-10: gos mchog tu phra la ring zhing nar ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-11: dbang po'i brda sprod pa 'don cing bstan bcos shes shing mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-12: lha'i bu brgya stong du ma rjes su 'brang zhing lha'i gser gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na rgyu ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-15: do shal gyis brang brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-16: ha cang tsho ba'ang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-17: ha cang ring pa yang ma yin pa rkang pa shin tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-18: bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa'i kha zas za ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-19: mkhur tshos bud med brgya stong gis zur gyis blta ba dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-20: glang po che sa srung gi bu rgyags pa'i rna ba'i rlung gis sgra phyung ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-22: lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i lus la rus pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-23: de'i lus la nad thams cad med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-24: dri rab tu zhim pa dang ldan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-25: gdangs shin tu snyan cing 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang ldan no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482a-26: lha'i rgyal po de'i lus kyi dris phog na spos kyi glang po che rab tu rgyags shing bdo ba yang rgyags pa yongs su 'bri bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-1: lha'i dbang po de'i lus kyi tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad tsam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-2: de'i gzugs che ba gser gyi mdog lta bu de mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-3: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyang de'i gan du 'dong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-4: lha'i dbang po'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra'o zhes brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-5: de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi tshad thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-8: dbang po chen po'i lus chung du mi rtag pa'i lus rjes su 'breng ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-9: gar mkhan gyi cha byad lta bur shin tu spras pa; glegs shing gi las dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-11: 'khrul 'khor gyi las lta bur byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-12: me tog gi las lta bur yud tsam zhig mdzes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-13: me long gi nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu la khyod ci'i phyir ngo mtshar du byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-14: drang srong chen po khyod dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus pha dang ma las skyes pa'i tshigs tshigs mtshams mtshams re re la yang dbang po chen po 'dun par 'gyur ba la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-16: gzhan yang dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus la rdzu 'phrul gyi sgyu ma la da ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-17: de nas dge slong ma 'gags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bskul bar shes nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-18: ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus dge slong ma 'gags pa lha'i gser 'bar ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:482b-19: byi ru'i sdong po'i kha dog mchog dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-1: gi nor bu dang cod pan 'phyang ba'i gtsug phud dang ldan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-2: mkhur ba rgyas shing mdangs snum pa'i mdog can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-3: mig lha'i aatpa [*autpa?] la sngon po 'dra la nor bu dang spug dang rdo'i snying po dang ldan pa'i klu'i rgyal po lta bur kun tu snang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-4: de'i gzugs chen por mngon par grub pa'i lha'i dri dang gzugs kyis 'khor thams cad snang bar byas pas ngo mtshar dang dga' bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-5: dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang ldan par gyur to /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-6: de'i cho 'phrul de drang srong chen po rgyas pas mthong nas snying 'phar zhing stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-7: rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur par sgra cher kye aa la la legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-8: gang gi phyir bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad cing 'dus la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo nas 'di lta bu sngon ma mthong ba'i cho 'phrul mthong ba mi nyid thob pa bdag don mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-13: dbang po chen po'i lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-14: gang 'di dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus gser 'bar ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-15: nor bu mchog las grub pa 'di gnyis gang bzang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-16: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483a-17: drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-0: gang 'di dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus de la @483b dbang po chen po'i lus kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-8: bsod nams las grub pa'i lus la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa'i khyad par ni de ltar lta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-10: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris de na brgya byin gyi chung ma dam pa bde sogs zhes bya ba lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing dga' tshal na 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-13: me tog gis brgyan cing 'bar ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-15: autpa la dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-18: mchog tu 'bar ba'i cha byad 'dzin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-19: gos mchog tu phra la 'tsher ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-27: se mo dos lus dud pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-28: dpral ba dang mkhur ba che la shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-29: nor bu dang gser shin tu rnam par phye ba'i ska rags kyis bcing pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-30: 'jo zhing sgeg pa'i rjes su chags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-31: mig ring zhing che la 'jam pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-32: lag pa'i nang ri mo ring pos khyab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-38: rtsod pa'i nyes pa spangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-39: bzhin khro gnyer gyi rim pa g-yo ba dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:483b-40: mngal 'dzin pa'i skyon rnam par spangs pa'i lus dang ldan pa'o /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-0: lha'i bu mo bde sogs zhes bya ba de shin tu 'dod pa la chags @484a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-1: pa las byung ba'i sgeg pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-2: ri rab la yod pa'i gzhal med khang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-4: 'khri shing gi bla res khebs par byas pa las byung ba'i 'dod pa skyes pas byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-5: me tog 'thor ba dang bcas pa'i rlung ldang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-6: ha cang ring ba'ang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-7: ha cang thung ba'ang ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-8: dku ha cang sbom pa'ang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-9: ha cang phra ba'ang ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-10: lus ha cang sbom pa'ang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-11: ha cang phra ba'ang ma yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-15: dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri'i ngad rlung gis bdas pa rmad du byung bas mdzes par byas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-17: de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha de dag ni nad med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-21: gzhal med khang gi gnas kyi nang na gnas shing rgyu ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-22: de dag gi tshe ni lha'i lo stong thub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-23: de dag lha'i gnas de na gnas pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-24: bsod nams zad nas tshe zad par 'gyur ba'i tshe shi 'pho ba'i ltas sngon ma byung ba lnga 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-25: rdzing bu shel ltar gsal ba reg na bde ba'i rlung ldang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-26: rdzing bu'i 'gram 'khri shing gi bla re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-27: shing gel pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par zhugs pa na 'bru mar gyis gtor ba lta bu 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-28: des 'bru mar gyis gtor ba de mthong nas snying dngangs skrag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484a-29: rdzing bu de nas byung nas nags stug por rgyug cing bros so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-0: de rings par 'gro ba lha'i bu mo @484b de dag gis mthong nas phyi bzhin du 'brangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-1: de nags stug po de'i nang na shing drung zhig na gnas shing 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-2: de nas lha'i bu mo de dag snying rje rje skad du ga chad par du zhing 'di skad ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-3: jo bo bdag cag bor te gcig pu shing drung 'di na ci dga' zhes 'dzer to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-4: de ngu zhing dman pa'i sgras slar 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-5: bdag 'di na sngon ma byung ba 'bru mar gyis gtor ba lta bu lus la byung ngo zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-6: mchan khung gnyis nas rdul byung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-7: de dag gis rdul byung ba mthong ba dang lha'i bu mo de dag ring du dong ste yongs su spangs so; ;des yongs su spangs par shes nas mya ngan gyis reg go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-8: de mya ngan gyis reg pas dbugs drag tu rgyu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-9: dbugs rgyu ba'i rgyus lus la gdung ba skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-10: de lus dang sems gdungs pas me tog gi thod sngon rnyis mi srid pa'ang rnyis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-12: sngon rnyings mi srid pa'i gos kyang rnyings /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-13: lha'i gding ba bting ba'i mal cha la yang dga' ba mi rnyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-14: de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas kyis nyen par shes nas de'i dri de mi bzod de ring du spangs nas snying rje rje skad ga chad par bdag la dbang med par du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-15: 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen nas rab tu ngu zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:484b-16: kyi hud lus mchog shin tu 'jam pa lha'i skyed mos tshal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-0: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gling na ngur pa dang @485a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-2: lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-3: dga' tshal na bya ka ran da ka lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-4: rdzing bu na spos kyi glang po che 'dra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-6: skyed mos tshal na bung ba lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-7: 'dres pa'i tshal na me tog rna rgyan lta bu bdag cag bor te da gar song /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-8: gang na gnas zhes 'dzer cing bdag la dbang med par du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-9: de bdag la dbang med par rims nad kyis btab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-10: rims nad des lus dang sems dkrugs nas mgron po mgron pa mang po dang bral te 'brog 'chol ba dang mtshungs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-11: lam grogs gru zhig pa dang 'dra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-12: rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu stor ba dang mtshungs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-13: ri zhig pa dang 'dra bar mi rtag pa'i rlung gis gtor nas lus sa'i steng na 'dre ldog ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-14: nam mkha' lding gi mchus klu gzhon nu zin pa dang 'dra bar 'dar bzhin du myur ba myur bar thal mo sbyar ba nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-15: lha'i bu mo de dag la gsol ba btab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-16: tshur shog la lag pa'i thal mos nga'i lus la reg par gyis shig ces snying 'dar la gdungs bzhin du smre sngags 'don cing gsol ba btab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485a-17: lha'i bu mo de dag gis bltas nas mi nye bar spangs te yan lag la reg pa lta ga la byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-0: me tog can gyi yal ga thogs te 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i bu de'i snying gar bzhag nas 'di skad ces 'dzer @485b to; ;tho ris kyi bsod nams yongs su nyams te da myur du 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-1: lha'i bu de bdag lus kyis yongs su btang bar shes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-4: ces sgra cher snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-5: kye ma'o mtho ris lha'i gnas 'di lha'i yo byad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-7: skyed mos tshal mchog na rtse ba rjes su myong zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-8: lha'i bu mo 'di dag la bdag gis sdug par bsam pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-9: da bdag 'chi ba'i dus la phyogs shing zhugs pa'i tshe de dag nye bar mi gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-10: 'di skad ces khyod 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-11: yang dang yang du bdag gi gnas la lta zhing sa la 'gyel nas snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-15: aar mo nig ltar 'jam pa'i rdo leb dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-23: gzhal med khang dam pa sgo mang po 'di dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-24: lha yul pa'i lha'i gnas 'di dag bor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-25: da ni mtho ris kyi g-yang sa nas gdon mi za bar lhung ngo zhes skrag pa skyes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-26: de rang gi gnas la lta zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:485b-28: bdag gi mdza' bo byams pa rnams nga 'chir nye na ci'i phyir mi smra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-0: 'di ltar nga ni de 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon @486a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-1: pa dgongs mal ring por chas kyi tshur shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-3: phyis ngas kyang khyod mi mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-4: khyod kyis kyang nga mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-6: mtho ris 'di nas bsod nams kyi 'bras bu zad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-7: 'pho bar 'gyur pa'i tshe bdag la mun pa lta bur snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-10: sil snyan kyang mi len nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-11: de dag gis sgra yang mi grag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-12: las kyi nyes pas bdag ni 'dir nyams par gyur to zhes de skad smras nas yang smre sngags 'don to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-15: dri zas mdzes par byas pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-16: gang mig stong pa'i lha'i 'khor du 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-17: phyis yang de mthong bar 'gyur ba ni bsod nams che'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-18: kun nas skyes pa'i me tog nga'i klad pa la 'dug pa ci'i phyir rnyings zhes lha'i bu des smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-19: lha'i pu de sems dman pa dri ma med pa'i rna cha'i gdu bu 'gul ba thogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-20: de dag thams cad me tog khyer te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-21: lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing lha mo bde sogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-22: lha mo dag phyi bzhin 'brang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-25: sna tshogs rgyan dang; gtsug phud lnga pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486a-26: tum pu ru la sogs pa'i lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-0: dri za rnams lha'i glu dbyangs len cing 'dong ba dag gis ltas lnga po des nyam thag par gyur pa @486b mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-1: snying rje bskyed de nga ro gcig tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-3: mi rtag pa 'di ni rab tu drag cing mi bzod do zhes tshig smra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-4: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang lha'i bu de la bltas nas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-7: bdag cag thams cad kyi 'gro ba'ang 'di 'dra'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-10: lha'i bu de dag gis dbyangs gcig tu smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-12: dge ba byed pa'i 'jig rten mi'i 'jig rten du song zhig ces byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-13: lha'i bu des bdag ni nges par 'chi yang dag snyam du bsams te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-14: thal mo sbyar nas lha mang po de dag la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-15: bdag ni 'chi 'pho ba'i dus la nye bar gnas kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-16: lha'i bu thams cad bdag la bzod par mdzod cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-17: de'i tshe shugs ring du phyung nas ltas gnyis 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-18: mig padma'i lo ma lta bur 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-19: rgyan thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-20: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis rgyan mi snang bar gyur ba mthong nas me tog man da ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-21: padma la sogs pas mngon par gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-24: sil snyan gyi sgra yang byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-25: rgyan de dag kyang lhas bsdus par mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-26: 'dzam bu'i gling la dga' ba bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-27: de mchi ma zag cing ga chad par ngu ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:486b-28: 'chi ba'i dus kyi chos rnams sbyor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-1: tshe yongs su zad nas rlung drag po langs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-2: rlung dri rab tu zhim pa dang ldan pa des de'i lus la phog nas gtor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-3: lha'i bu de gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-4: gnas de nas 'pho ba na lus kyi gnas mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-5: de gnas de nas shi 'phos nas mir skye ba yongs su len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-6: mir skyes te ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe ma la mtshan mar blta ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-10: rgod pa la dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-13: kha dog sna tshogs 'tsher ba'i gos 'chang bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-14: lha'i kha zas shin tu bzang po la sred par 'gyur; de ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas bskor bar mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-15: de dri rab tu zhim pa'i cha lugs la dga' bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-16: gnyid log na yang rmi lam na lha'i don bskul ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-18: de mngal na gnas pa na phyin ci ma log pa'i rmi lam mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-19: btsas pa'i dus na yang 'dod chags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487a-21: gti mug rnam par spangs nas btsas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-0: rkang pa shin @487b tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-4: rkang pa ring la sbom pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-5: ro stod seng ge'i lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-8: de gcig tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la chags par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-10: gos phra ba la dga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-11: skyed mos tshal la dga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-15: nor thams cad 'byor ba'i rigs chen por skye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-18: yang dag par sdom pa la dga' bar 'gyur; gal te 'dod pa la shin tu chags nas sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-19: tshul khrims la mi dga' bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-20: de phyir gcig nas gcig tu dbul po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-22: tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la bstod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-23: ha cang sngo ba yang ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-24: ha cang dkar ba'ang ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-26: gzhan gyi chung ma la chags shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-27: bdag gi chung ma la mi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-28: rtsa lag gi skye bo la dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-30: 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris nas 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas 'byung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-32: drang srong chen po rgyas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:487b-33: drang srong chen po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:488a-2: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:488a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:488a-4: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:488a-5: drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:488a-6: 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:488a-7: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ni mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-014:488a-9: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad sar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa ////
